titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 256) to amend title 11 of the United States Code, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 256) to amend title 11 of the United States Code, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-43, by Mr. Gingrey.
The rule waives all points of order against the bill and against its consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 21.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 211.
DEBATE - Subsequently, the House resumed debate on H. Res. 211.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 199 (Roll no. 104).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 196 (Roll no. 105).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S. 256) to amend title 11 of the United States Code.
